name: Onboard Go Around at Zurich: Swiss Bombardier C Series CS100 (with ATC)
description:
Onboard view of a late go-around at Zurich (ZRH), onboard a Swiss Bombardier C Series CS100, operating flight LX391 from Manchester on July 29 2016.  Includes ATC for the approach and second approach.  

**First go-around of a Bombardier C Series in commercial service!**

We commence our final approach for runway 14, and although ATC have asked us to slow down, we are coming in hot and high for our landing.  As we cross the threshold about to touch down, we go around for a second approach.  We climb out from Zurich in the powerful CS100, getting a great view of the airport and Lake Zurich as we are vectored around for our second, successful this time, landing.


✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
